reviews.review_text: Beautiful and massive gym space. They have a great membership program that gives you access to a tanning bed, steam and sauna room, yoga studio, locker and unlimited fresh towels. The location is great as its right next to Save On Foods and Shoppers Drug Mart. They have all the equipment you need to do various workouts and multiple sanitization stations to wipe surfaces and equipments. Highly recommend people in Burnaby to go there once while exploring gym options.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much for sharing your review! We appreciate the positive feedback!

reviews.review_text: Very nice gym . Lots and lots of Workout station . Usually no to min wait for a workout machine.Not allowed in take pic . There is a ladies only section . Few clicks
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review James! We hope you have a great workout on your next visit to the club

reviews.review_text: This is a very good gym! Large room with simulators.  Simulators are duplicated.  The simulators are made under the brand of a sports club GoodLife. The condition of the simulators is constantly monitored by the master and repaired if necessary. There are several departments.  Hall for group lessons.  Place for exercise on the mat.  Separate room for girls who are shy. Great changing room.  There are double size lockers for full height.  Many mirrors, hair dryers, lotion.  There is even an iron. In the mens locker room 9 showers, shampoo, shower gel, hair conditioner.  In the shower clean. Large towel issued at the entrance. There is a Finnish and Turkish sauna. Several bars with drinking water. Vertical turbo solarium, several massage chairs. I used a free ticket for 3 visits during the week.  This is a super offer! There is a large underground free parking. Great location. Successful sport club.

This is the best gym Ive ever been to! Staff is amazing and so friendly! A very welcoming environment, they really care about their members. Looks like a really taken care of facility, the hours are incredible. 110% would recommend if you are thinking of joining a gym, they even do complimentary 1 day trails, so if your gym shopping around definitely a place to stop by.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful 5-star review, Nicole! Were happy to see how much youre enjoying your visits, and we hope to welcome you back soon for another great workout

reviews.review_text: The best gym ever with tan rooms, classes, so big area to train plus they very professional personal trainers, practicing now with Lioyd one of the best of them, planning to continue training with him

My son and I were just in town for a couple of days and I m supportive of my son s workout needs. We did not encounter any serious issues and for a fitness place that is open 24/7, I would have my son join if we lived here. My son said the equipment was in great condition, and privacy is there when necessary. Beyond that, for how big and busy this city can be, it is nice to know there are those who still find value in great customer service. Doing the right thing matters more at times than doing things right.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This is great to hear! Were thrilled that your son has had a great experience at this location. We appreciate your feedback and for taking the time to write your Review! :)

reviews.review_text: I don t know why this gym doesn t have a higher rating. I love this gym & my experience every time that I drive all the way from Langley for my workouts. My first time in, a really friendly staff member gave me a tour and made me feel so at home. The gym is very clean, even the showers and towels. The staff always greet me upon entry and seem eager to answer any questions I may have. The atmosphere in the gym is really great due to the variety of people that attend. The women s section is quite small, but still has all equipment necessary to get a good workout in. The overall layout of the gym is really fantastic and there s plenty of space for a hiit setup, walking exercises or jump roping. Thank you for having created such a safe and welcoming environment. I definitely recommend this gym!!!

I always recommend this location to all of my friends! The place is huge, theres a lot of equipment to use, the atmosphere is great!  And to top it off, the staff here are so friendly and supportive when it comes to your fitness goals! Have been going to this location since 2018 and I dont regret it at all. Special shoutout to the Assistant GM Ruba and Fitness Motivator Bella for always being kind, supportive, and for working so hard!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your Review, Michael! Were so happy to hear about your experience at this location and enjoy the atmosphere! We also appreciate the kind words about our staff!

reviews.review_text: I love everything about this location. I had my first appointment/introduction with Hamzeh, he was super nice and helpful. I usually take budypump classes which I love, but the way I see there is no wait time for work out machines even in the afternoon that is supposed to be busy time. Definitely recommend this club
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and recommendation!

reviews.review_text: Gained my 5 star rating yet again after they started almost all the services and 24 hours atleast 4 days in a week. One of the best spacious gyms they have across Canada. Definitely recommend who is looking for a great gym and want to make their happy place.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Anurag, thank you for sharing this feedback. Many of the restrictions in place are a result of the pandemic and are temporary measures. We encourage speaking with the club manager to discuss these concerns further.

reviews.review_text: One of the best GoodLifes Ive visited.  The gym is always clean and the staff are super helpful and welcoming.  The equipment is kept in great condition.    It has never been too busy while Ive been there which is a bonus.   Definitely love coming to this location
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for such an amazing 5 star review Peter! Were happy to hear how much youre enjoying the club and we cant wait to welcome you back to the club for another great workout! See you soon

reviews.review_text: I had the best personal training sessions with Paolo. He was excellent during each session that we had together, however i am sad to find out that he is leaving the gym since it wont be the same without him there!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share this amazing review and 5 star rating!

reviews.review_text: I have been training with Paolo at Goodlife and I will continue doing it. I love the way he combines different exercises, gets my heart pumping fast and achieve my results. I am working on body toning, muscle building and strengthening and his training is really helping me to reach achieve my goals. Training with a personal trainer can be really mandatory when you want to achieve your results faster and in an efficient way. But most important is to find the right trainer! After trying 2-3 different trainers in the city, I decided I to work with Paolo as he does care about me and my goals. If looking for the best training at good life I recommend working with Paolo!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for this amazing rating and review! We look forward to continuing to celebrate your future milestone and goals achieved.

reviews.review_text: Ruba is truly incredible. She knows her members, she knows her team, and she knows what she s doing. The work she puts in to create a positive gym atmosphere and equip her team is obvious. I don t know how we got so lucky to have her.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for taking the time to share this amazing review and 5 star rating!

reviews.review_text: Nice place,friendly and awesome staff,equipments are quite diverse also it can be quite busy at peak hours but still not bad Please schedule more RPM and body pump
Training with Paolo has been fantastic. Large gym, always room on machines. Friendly staff with separate personal training area. Overall great experience so far.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating Alex!

reviews.review_text: I ve been to many gyms in the Burnaby area and good life is by far my favourite. They have all the equipment needed and amazing staff. To be honest, I used to bash the women s section before realizing it is the best one within miles of this area. Way better than the women s section in the Metrotown GoodLife. I don t use the women s section tho  lol
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful rating Cynthia!

reviews.review_text: Solid gym, everything you could possibly need for weight training. Staff is always friendly and theyre typically fast at fixing any broken equipment. Can get busy at peak hours but Its predictable so you can avoid it depending on your schedule. Coming from club 16 I would say that this gym is worth the extra few bucks a month. Plus you cant beat the 24/7 availability.

MY 2ND HOME!!!! Cant beat any gym clubs I have tried out there. Besides on how I always complete my workout routine with this club, and have all the machines that I need. Its a 24 hours club by that means I can go at any time I want without any hassle. Me and my husband love love their childminding. Always attentive with our kids and the other kids. They have a huge womens only section and a clean womens changing and shower room. I like how they maintain cleancliness there too. I love how I can bring any friend or my husband for free with me at any time with the monthly plan I purchased. I always leave with a contentment working out here and I dont think Ill ever transfer to any other clubs. The only thing tho, I hope you can also have childminding @noon on Fridays. It would be so much convenient for us parents to workout! However, I hope you can keep the great job Goodlife fitness Northgate!!!!

Attended this gym for quite some time. Love the staff, the equipment is top of the class. There are always plenty of machines and weights to use. Squat rack being used? ah well. There are five more to choose from. Not to mention the size of this place! It s huge Love this gym

Amazing gym with amazing staff. As soon as I walked in, I felt like part of the gym community. Ive been training with one of the trainers and it has been one of the best investments Ive ever made. The Fitness Manager and my trainer have single handedly made my first ever gym experience less intimidating and something I look forward to being a part of. Thank you GoodLife for employing great people!

Awesome location to train at! I have been training with Gordon and hes been amazing. He is very personable and knows just how to motivate me during my bad days. I recommend him to everyone, especially if you are trying to make a change to your fitness and health!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Stanley! Were so happy to hear about your experience training at the gym with Gordon. Thank you for sharing your kind words!

reviews.review_text: Great gym. Staff are all friendly (not sure why others are complaining). This location is spacious, has plenty of cardio machines (all with live TV), and the change rooms are clean and big.  They brought the Toronto GoodLife experience to BC. I would recommend this gym if you dont want to over pay, and still get a great gym... oh ya its 24 hours too, 7 days a week - huge bonus!

I have been training with Paolo for 8-1/2 months. He is a thorough and engaging trainer. He is constantly changing and adjusting our routines to push me to reach my always progressing goals. I would highly recommend Paolo for all levels of personal training!!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review Christopher! Were happy to hear all the great work you and Paolo have done for your fitness journey! We hope to welcome you back to the club soon for another great workout with Paolo

reviews.review_text: Big, bright gym with lots of equipment - solid offering of free weights. Knowledgeable staff and trainers. 24/7 operations which is nice if you want to go super early or late. Been a member for 1 1/2 years and will definitely keep coming back.

I love this gym. Its a great size and the womens only section is big too. I go before work and for once DO NOT have to bring shampoo, a towel, hair dryer, moisturizer or a straightener because its all there for your use. Definitely lightens the gym bag load! Ive had good experiences with most of the staff there, only one time I had someone super dismissive. Mimi or Momo, I think Momo. I had concerns about maintenance that had gone undone for weeks and she super super rude about it. Its the only time Ive considered finding a new gym.

I love that they have a womans only section. The bathrooms/change room is nice and spacious. They have a super easy to use app for booking a time slot to workout. The covid procedure seems to be working great.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star review Mia! Were happy to hear how much youre enjoying the club and our app

reviews.review_text: Ive been training with Paolo for almost a year, working with him to reach my fitness goals has been excellent. The environment has been awesome and pushes me to strive to work even harder. Paolo has built a strong connection with me and I look forward to our weekly training sessions.
Great gym with lots of machines, free weights, massage chairs, steam room and sauna. Open 24/7.

Absolutely amazing gym...by far worth the money each month. The trainers are superb and will work with you to develop in ways that work towards your sport or goals. I have had the same trainer for 3 years plus and he has seen me through thick and thin. No matter what, the workouts were always geared towards what I could do....they were challenging...and I always come away having laughed, worked hard and with a feeling of success. Some days, as I fought Lyme disease, the workouts were super easy...no worries. It was what I could do that day. I do a number of sports like indoor rowing, triathlon, spin cycling, running, indoor rock climbing and open water swimming. The workouts help me in ALL disciplines. And for me, the trainers and the staff at this Goodlife feel like family. Its my go to place....feel 100% supported here.

I have been a member of this gym for years and I mainly attend the group classes.  I really enjoy taking Carrie s, Angela s, May s and Kendall s classes. I can t say enough about how they all have different teaching styles and not everyone likes it but I do. It keeps me on my toes and I have fun working out with them. Btw I really like Carrie s straight forward attitude!!!

This gym is great.  The staff are nice and welcoming. Good equipment and fantastic lighting with lots of mirrors to check out my gains. Also, to catch ppl mirin my aesthetics is a great confidence booster. AND THERES LIKE 5 SQUAT RACKS.. LEG DAY EVERYDAY #bless

I have been coming to this location for a few years now. I just do my work outs and leave. What really tore at my heart strings was when the front desk girl Francine, instantly went to hug a member when she found out her mother passed away. You dont see great customer service like this anymore. I love how compassionate and caring she is, I have never interacted with her but this morning I said hi. Though all the stress of not being able to see, she still puts others first.

Never had a problem here. You can bring someone with you for free EVERY time you work out, it s awesome.($50/month) to access any location in BC. Seem to have a good selection of classes, it s too bad the sovereign location doesn t have more morning classes, but this location picks up their slack!

Pre-COVID it used to be 24 hour gym and reduced hours on holidays, now it s not 24 hours and closed holidays. Still 5 stars because it s a great gym but hoping the hours go back to before so I don t have to pay $20 drop in at a gym that is open on holidays when I have a full time membership here
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great 5 star review Steve! Were definitely hoping to start expanding hours now that were open across the country again and we can start resuming normal operations. Please feel free to share any other future feedback with us and enjoy your next workout

reviews.review_text: This gym is held together by a friendly girl, who smiles, waves and acknowledges every member and guest. Francine deserves more recognition, she is seen doing her job correctly. She greets us, she gives us hugs if we re down. She s a little mama in the making.

I love this place! I was a GL member in Ontario and, when I moved to BC, I had to cancel my membership becasue there were not any locations here. It was an easy process and I spent the next few months trying different locations in the area to try and find a place that I liked as much. I finaly settled at one place and hated it so much that I barely went. I was SO happy to see a GL location here! I waited until I was able to cancel my membership with my other gym and I made an appointment with Louise to go over my options here. She was absolutely fantastic! Ive now been here for a few months and there is so much that I just love about this place. Here are a few highlights: 1. Great location. Think about it. Youre on your way home from work and you can hit the gym, grab that jug of milk that you needed from Price Smart and that prescription from Shoppers and not have to run all over the place doing it. 2. Gorgeous facility. GL has a ton of space with loads of new equipment. Every piece of cardio equipment has a little TV screen and an iPod/iPhone charger built into it. This means that the hour you spend sweating isnt boring and you also reduce the risk of dropping your iPhone because its attached to something. 3. Classes. The classes here are fantastic! There are a lot of free ones including Body Pump, Body Flow and Zumba. There is a seperate studio for spinning classes and those are free too. Yoga classes are in a much quieter area and are not included but are really not expensive. 4. Staff. I know that a lot of reviews here said that the staff are not good but Ive never had an issue with them and have always found them to be really nice. There are sales staff, customer service staff and trainers and they are all really professional and friendly. (As for the claim that they lied about cancelation fees - read the contract before you sign it because everything is in there. And if you keep your copies of the paperwork then its super easy to cancel things if you need to.) 5. The locker rooms. This might not seem like a big deal but when you have spent the last few years at a gym with rusty lockers, communal showers and not a single ammenity then this is a huge wow. The locker rooms are massive and nothing has been overlooked here. They provide irons and ironing boards, hair dryers, straighteners, curling irons, shampoo, conditioner, body wash etc right down to Q-Tips. There is a really nice sauna and there are two gorgeous little steam rooms in here too. I was really happy to see that there are about ten private shower stalls (and they are HUGE) because this means that I will never again have an old womans naked bum rub against me (that did happen and I was traumatized. True story!). 6. The training. I have not signed up for training here yet but I did go for the free consultation and Mike was great. He set up a workout schedule for me based on what I like to do and what I want to accomplish and he also gave me a lot of nutritional information. Ive already lost about ten pounds! 7. Motivation. GL offers optional workout cards that you can fill out when you complete workouts. They have a lot of incentives for people to get the results they want and everyone there is more than happy to do what they can to help members reach their goals (results = more customers). Definitely check this place out for yourself!

Very nice fitness, spacious, clean and bright! Good access and plenty of devices. The only problem is distance for me! Why don t you have a branch in Coquitlam! It s quite a populated city which needs one!
Alexey was really nice and helpful. Very knowledgeable and helped me to achieve my goals. If you need a personal trainer goodlife will be a really good option.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for sharing this wonderful rating and feedback!

reviews.review_text: Signed up today. Had a guy named Justin help me out with the process. He was very kind and professional. Highly recommend and appreciate this location. The gym it self has everything anyone could need.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you John for the 5 star review and were so excited to welcome you to Goodlife Fitness! We wish you all the best on your fitness goals at the club and feel free to contact us if you ever have any questions

reviews.review_text: Great gym, clean and sanitary. They have a good selection of equipment and the staff are always friendly and smiling. Great place to pump some iron.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the 5 star review Stu! Were glad to hear how great your club experience has been and the great work by the team to make it even better!

reviews.review_text: Dear Sarah, Its unfortunate that you failed to write the truth about your experience at Goodlife and with me. You neglected to mention that recording your workouts meant that you were actually filming them on your camera phone which goes completely against our member rules and etiquette, and you are also in breach of your membership. After politely asking you to stop filming the first time, you completely ignored my request. You continued to film and slam weights on several occasions (even after you asked my husband to step out of the way of your camera!) and I know for a fact that several other members and employees also had issues with you because they brought it to my attention. Sarah, our RPM group fitness instructor asked you politely to stop dropping the barbell (from waist high) as it was interrupting her class beside you when all the members continued to turn and look at you repeatedly. This was extremely loud and you were well aware of how it was disturbing other members. You just shrugged this off and didnt seem to care about how this was affecting others around you. Leila, our administrator also had a chat with you where she tried to explain the proper rules (all gyms are the same) but you didnt seem interested in hearing about it. You also said that when you signed up, the Fitness Advisor told you it was okay to film but when Leila asked who that advisor was, you couldnt give a name even though it is written on your contract. Simon, our manager is well aware of the situation and I can tell you this....after six years with Goodlife, never ONCE have I had a complaint against me. I know our rules and etiquette of the gym and slamming weights and filming are not part of them or any other gym. Since you claim to be a powerlifter perhaps its a blessing that you found another gym which specializes in powerlifting as Goodlife certainly doesnt fit your criteria. Good luck in your new gym. *Rachel....thank you for a refreshing review! We are working on connecting to wifi and should hopefully have it by the time you come back.

Decided to check out this location the other day. I typically go to the location near Metrotown. This location was not as crowded compared to the other location. And they had more machines to use (more than 1 bicep macine). Overall a nice gym but to out of the way for me. I would still recommending checking out the location at least once.
Best gym Ive been to yet. Cancelled my Steve Nash Fitness World membership to go here. Great staff, lots of machines, and very big. Super happy to go here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow! Thanks so much, Hoger. Were glad you are enjoying the Club.

reviews.review_text: Best gym in town. So big and spacious with all the machines you can think of. Plus its open 24/7.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the great rating and review John!

reviews.review_text: I have been going to this gym with my wife for almost three years now and the experience has been absolutely great, specially the guys at the front desk....super friendly attitude.... just one minor detail.... some of the equipment in the women s area have been broken for almost a couple of weeks now and it would be good to have them fixed... great place overall

Wow, so much gratuitous bitching and whining over petty nonsense (like tanning). Grow up, folks. Ive lived all over the world and this is the best gym on earth. I work out here every time I come back to Canada and its such a joy compared to every other gym that Ive ever seen. The only thing missing is wifi which, unlike tanning, is critical for powering through a long tough cardio workout. Please get some. Arrange with Shaw to get a hotspot or something.

Great facility, equipment is top notch, people that workout here are great. Thanks for addressing the issues I had brought up, I have updated my review to reflect the great work you staff have been doing lately.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Eric, Thanks for taking the time to share your feedback. Its great you like the facility and equipment. We have forwarded your comments to the manager of the club to review. If you have any more information to share or require further assistance with your account, please contact membercare@goodlifefitness.com. Thanks!

reviews.review_text: I constantly see employees wiping down the machines and checking equipment. Management or something must of changed in the last 7 months or so because theyve definitely stepped it up.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star rating and review! We appreciate you taking the time to share this with us!

reviews.review_text: Great staff, amazing facility with 24/7 access to the gym. It also has a womens section aside from the unisex side. They also provide fitness class and hot yoga.
I love this gym! They have everything what you need to be in shape: weight room, fitness classes, hot yoga studio, steam room and etc. And its opened 24 hours!
Good place to workout. Neat and clean , updated equipments.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This is great to hear! Thank you so much for our review!

reviews.review_text: Great gym, busy place, has lots of equipment. Has a sauna & steam room.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating!

reviews.review_text: By far the best group exercise classes in town. If you can take any class on the schedule get to one with Kendall. She is an absolute rockstar. This place has everything you need to get you to your fitness goal

Ive been here a couple of months now and really appreciate the equipment, amenities, and friendliness of the staff. Ive got to give a shout-out to Francine... she is always there in the morning to greet me by name and help with anything I need.

HOT YOGA! and Positive environment that will rival any motivational Youtuber! Being in the presence of Hardworking individuals will not only Motivate you but Change you Physically. In to Gainsville I go! Busy times are : 6 to 9 Monday to Friday.
Good service can be busy in the afternoon 4-7pm lots of machines to do your workout on
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating!

reviews.review_text: Great work out environment, plus with awesome people to guide. Thank you so much Ruba, Lawerence and Paolo for the help in achieving the goals. Hope to reach there soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing 5 star review Vimpy! Were happy to hear how much youre enjoying your time at the club and we appreciate the kind words regarding our team!

reviews.review_text: Great gym I drive in from Surrey to come here on the way to work and pass by numerous gyms. Very clean facility and lots of machines.
Clean and a great assortment of equipment for people at all fitness levels. All I wish is you can use the trainers on an as need basis and not be tied into their plans
Not been a member long but so far so good. Clean. Fun classes. People are friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating!

reviews.review_text: This is the best gym location in Burnaby, Ive been a member since the day it opened. Staff and facitilites are top-rated, its an awesome gym not a social house, lol
Complete place with a lot of machines and services. Washrooms are not very clean but OK. A lot of people who workout and makes you feel energized!
Great staff, equipment is top notch and well maintained and it has a good atmosphere. Classes happen often and there is an amazing variety.
Love my experience there every time! great staff, good equipment and and overall amazing gym!
Clean, spacious, well maintained equipment, good classes, schedules, variety and availability. Best thing: low pressure from sales staff; felt informed rather than hounded.
Has been training with Andy for a year. Excellent coach and support me to gain weight and body shape. Great job
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for your 5 star review Nick! We are happy to hear you are seeing great results!

reviews.review_text: Good gym. Came here after going to Club 16/She s Fit and it s 100x better. It s more expensive but worth it
Very big and spacious gym. More machine than the other good life
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing 5-star review, Kalvin! We hope to welcome you back soon for another great workout

reviews.review_text: Staff members are helpful. Great equipment. Child mining is excellent! All at an affordable price
I have been extremely satisfied with service, facility, equipment membership Im a happy customer      thank you good life fitness
Good gym. Go see Matt Slack as your personal trainer if you wanna get serious bout your goals
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the wonderful rating and review Sanj! We would not be here without your support!

reviews.review_text: Our staff have memberships here and they love the clean massive open gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Were so glad they love the Club! Thanks for the kind review.

reviews.review_text: I m so close to Metrotown location but this location Burnaby north gate  with the stuff are my favourite. Everything about this location is great here :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating and review Moji!

reviews.review_text: Friendly staff with a large location this is my new home gym for sure. Chris is an very good trainer !
Great gym! All the equipment you need and a great friendly helpful staff
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for taking the time to write a review, Chris! We have forwarded your kind words to the Club.

reviews.review_text: Paolo is super knowledgeable and I have enjoyed having him as my trainer.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing rating and review Devan! We appreciate this support!

reviews.review_text: Did a tour of Goodlife with Brett! Very informative and helpful with any questions that came up :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the incredible 5-star review, Victoria! We appreciate the kind words regarding Brett and we hope to welcome you back soon as a member to the club

reviews.review_text: Lots of equipments, the ladies area is also big and well equipped. The staff are very helpful and friendly.
Customer service is the best, so friendly and nice people! Hot yoga is good, price is reasonable :)
Ive recently been getting a lot of compliments on the rear; I guess I got my trainer Paulo to thank for that.
Its busy between 3pm -9pm... Still. Best gym ever
Clean and new equipment, super friendly staff. This location beats the Surrey location on all counts.
I have lost 40 pounds with Bruce and Paulo within 2 months working out here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: What an amazing accomplishment Steven! We love hearing success like yours and without it, we would not be here!

reviews.review_text: Paolo, help me a out from cutting weight and teaching me a lot of knowledge in weight lifting form and overall taking care of myself.
I saw all boys and girls go there are super fit. Very good looking.
Has everything you need to workout plus  memberships are not really expensive. Would recomend it 100%
24 hour gym. Affordable plan since I dont go during the daytime anyways.
No idea where these ratings come from lol, the gym is great and the price is better.
Being open 24/7 is the greatest part, staffs and machines are good too.
My go to place at 3am, burnaby is closer to my place but this one is more cleaned and organized.
They really have it all, great price. I can t say much more. Oy, the place is. A great place to hang out.
Great equipment, only issue is they run out of towels
Good
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the fantastic review and rating!

reviews.review_text: Huge gym, tons of equipment, nice change rooms, lots of space, flexible class schedules
Clean facilities,  friendly staff,  excellent gym!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for taking the time to write a review, Sarah! :)

reviews.review_text: Its always a good day when you can hit the gym!!!
Has everything you are looking for....Grate hours,  staff, classes and awesome equipment!!!!
24/4 hour gym with friendly staff. Very clean
Love this gym so much man
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you for the amazing 5 star review Jay! We appreciate the kind words and we cant wait to welcome you back for another amazing workout
